siteMetadata.title: Kostas Bariotis' Blog
siteMetadata.description: Senior full stack engineer @geekbot_io, co-organizer of @devitconf & @skgnodejs, host of Devastation Podcast.

posts.excerpt: Loved that article. So many insights. We all could gain a lot from each other's experiences. I truly believe that and that's why I started this blog in the first place. https://medium.com/@mitchellharper/28-things-i-d-do-differently-next-time-around…
posts.html:
